des: "This is the best fresh cranberry recipe I have. It is very sweet and has a very attractive visual appeal. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com. Pecans can be substituted for walnuts. "
ins: Just cover cranberries with fresh cold water and bring to a boil, cooking until berries are soft. Add the sugar, orange pulp, and raisins, and simmer slowly until thick. Add the nut meats. Continue cooking for 5 more minutes. May be served warm or chilled.
